abstract.para: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hansson, Christer, Hanson, Paul E. (2023): EULOPHIDAE OF COSTA RICA (HYMENOPTERA: CHALCIDOIDEA), 5: The genus Galeopsomyia Girault. No known copyright restrictions apply. See Agosti, D., Egloff, W., 2009. Taxonomic information exchange and copyright: the Plazi approach. BMC Research Notes 2009, 2:53https://doi.org/10.1186/1756-0500-2-53for further explanation.
